task_description: Implement Phase 1 of Repository Pulse Dashboard - Data Collection & API Layer

patterns.api_function_pattern: Arrow functions with async, JSDoc with @param/@returns/@throws, return fetchWithRetry(url) for standard endpoints
patterns.stats_202_pattern: Use direct fetch with getHeaders(), retryOnce param, sleep(2000), recursive call for retry, return { data: null, processing: true, rateLimit: null } on exhausted retry
patterns.test_pattern: describe/it blocks, clearCache in beforeEach, mock fetch with vi.fn(), mock response with headers object

existing_implementations.description: getCommitActivity already implements 202 handling pattern, getRepositoryEvents shows simple endpoint pattern, fetchWithRetry handles caching and errors
